title: How I Boosted My Productivity Using the Pomodoro Technique
content: Just wanted to share a small win! I started using the Pomodoro method (25-min focus + 5-min break), and it's made a huge difference. Highly recommend the Focus To-Do app. Anyone else use this?
author: User_85
